parameters.name: prompt
parameters.value:
Create a personalized follow-up email for a TenantFlow lead:

Lead Info:
- Name: {{ $json.name || 'Property Manager' }}
- Email: {{ $json.email }}
- Company Size: {{ $json.company_size || 'Not specified' }}
- Signup Date: {{ $json.signup_date }}
- Days Since Signup: {{ $json.daysSinceSignup }}
- Engagement Stage: {{ $json.engagementStage }}
- Last Activity: {{ $json.last_activity || 'Signup' }}

Email Guidelines:
- Professional but friendly tone
- Reference their specific situation/company size
- Provide value (tip, resource, or insight)
- Include a clear but non-pushy call-to-action
- Keep it concise (150-200 words)
- Personalize based on engagement stage

For stage '{{ $json.engagementStage }}', focus on:
- new: Welcome and quick wins
- early: Education and value demonstration  
- nurture: Case studies and social proof
- late: Re-engagement and special offers

Format as:
SUBJECT: [email subject]
BODY: [email body]

parameters.name: text

meta.description: Automated lead nurturing with personalized emails, lead scoring, and hot lead alerts using Ollama AI and Resend
